tutorial_quest.name: First Steps
tutorial_quest.description: Defeat 3 goblins in the Dark Forest to prove your worth as an adventurer.

forest_cleaning.name: Wolf Problem
forest_cleaning.description: The villagers are worried about wolves attacking travelers. Clear out 5 wolves from the forest.

orc_invasion.name: Orc Menace
orc_invasion.description: Orcs have been spotted in the Deep Woods. Defeat 3 orcs to protect the forest.

ancient_artifact.name: Lost Relic
ancient_artifact.description: An ancient artifact was stolen by bandits. Retrieve it from the Ancient Ruins.

undead_horde.name: Undead Rising
undead_horde.description: Undead creatures have risen in the Underground Tombs. Clear out 5 skeletons.

crystal_guardian.name: Crystal Protector
crystal_guardian.description: Ice Elementals are disrupting the natural balance. Defeat 2 Ice Elementals in the Crystal Caves.

dark_mage_hunt.name: Sorcerer Hunt
dark_mage_hunt.description: A Dark Mage has been causing trouble in the Deep Woods. Defeat the Dark Mage.

troll_slayer.name: Troll Bane
troll_slayer.description: A massive troll has been terrorizing travelers. Defeat the troll in the Underground Tombs.

dragon_slayer.name: Dragon's End
dragon_slayer.description: The legendary Fire Dragon terrorizes the land. Only a true hero can defeat this ancient evil.

treasure_hunter.name: Hidden Riches
treasure_hunter.description: Collect valuable materials: 10 Orc Teeth, 5 Wolf Fangs, and 3 Dark Crystals.

merchant_favor.name: Trading Favor
merchant_favor.description: Help the merchant by bringing 5 Gold Coins and 3 Iron Swords to prove your worth.

shadow_plague.name: Shadow Corruption
shadow_plague.description: Dark shadows have infected the moonlit glade. Defeat 3 shadow knights to cleanse the area.

arcane_scholar.name: Mage's Quest
arcane_scholar.description: Gather 3 Fire Gems and 2 Ice Crystals for the arcane scholar in the Spire of Sorcery.

void_walker.name: Into the Void
void_walker.description: Brave the Void Cavern and defeat all corrupted beings within (3 encounters).

temple_protector.name: Obsidian Oath
temple_protector.description: Cleanse the Obsidian Temple by defeating 4 undead abominations.

frost_mage.name: Ice Master
frost_mage.description: Defeat 4 Ice Elementals and collect 2 Crystalline Wands.

inferno_slayer.name: Flames of Wrath
inferno_slayer.description: Defeat 3 Fire Wraiths to prevent their invasion.

shadow_bow.name: Archer's Training
shadow_bow.description: Face 5 Goblin Archers in the Deep Woods to master ranged combat.
